NewsItems.title: December quarter post-tax profit at Airtel's Africa arm up 13% to $116 mn
NewsItems.body: Revenue rises 14% to $2,870 mn; Mobile money revenue up 41%, data revenue rises 27% in constant currency terms.

NewsItems.title: 2015 And 2021 Are Completely Different, Says Rajnish Kumar On AQR 2.0
NewsItems.body: Former SBI chairman says AQR 2.0 wont unearth large gaps in bank books.

NewsItems.title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
NewsItems.body: Enclosed, please find the schedule of Analyst / Investor meeting / interactions held at Mumbai on 29th January 2021.

NewsItems.title: NIFTY 50. 14,647.85. 366.65 (2.57%) NIFTY NEXT 50. 33,327.10. 665.55 (2.04%)
NewsItems.body: Bajaj Finserv Limited, a part of Bajaj Holdings & Investments Limited, is an Indian financial services company focused on lending, asset management and insurance.
